songs.title: Never Sober*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics From Snippet

[Verse 1]
Nigga, I don't even need to flex
Your bitch gon’ need some rest
Hit her with once, she free for sex
Yeah, I'm still balling out my set
All of these diamonds wet
You get no respect
You mad 'cause I’m ahead

[Chorus]
I don't need no lies, that's why I'm never sober
I don't wanna conversate unless you comin' over
I let the money elevate
It's better with my soldiers
She poppin' like a toaster
That’s how I’m-
